verbose_text: Elevated Mcl1 required continuous H-RasV12 signaling, since tamoxifen withdrawal from induced ERRAS cells reduced Mcl1 protein level, concomitant with the decline in MEK1/2 phosphorylation (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY E).
evidence: Mcl1 required continuous H-RasV12 signaling, since tamoxifen withdrawal from induced ERRAS cells reduced Mcl1 protein level, concomitant with the decline in MEK1/2 phosphorylation
